benchmark_details.name: CPSDbench
benchmark_details.overview: CPSDbench is a specialized evaluation benchmark designed for assessing the performance of large language models (LLMs) in public security tasks within the Chinese domain, integrating datasets related to public security collected from real-world scenarios and supporting a comprehensive assessment across multiple dimensions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To establish a standard framework for evaluating and comparing the performance of mainstream large language models in public security tasks.

data.source: Datasets collected from real-world public security scenarios.
data.annotation: Data collected from actual public security scenarios.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on defined evaluation procedures as outlined for each assessment task.
methodology.interpretation: Results are interpreted based on performance levels achieved across public security-related tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: Evaluation of nine mainstream LLMs, including proprietary models such as GPT-4, against CPSDBench tasks.
